text: The Brazil national under-17 football team represents Brazil in youth international football. They have been to every FIFA U-17 World Cup excluding 1993. They have won the title four times in 1997, 1999, 2003 and 2019 when they hosted the tournament. ==Competitive record== *A gold background color indicates that Brazil won the tournament. ===FIFA U-17
